001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.main;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Threads;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.datasets.SyntheticDataSets;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Notations;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearRegression;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.BasisFunction;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.basis.PolynomialFunction;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer.L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.plots.Plot;
015
016import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
017import java.util.Map;
018
019public class ModelRegularization {
020
021    public static void main(String[] args) {
022        showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport.RATIONAL_BIGINT, 1, 20, 9, 0);
023    }
024
025    private static <N extends Number> void showForNumberType(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport, int begin, int end, int m, long sleep) {
026        LinearRegression<N> regression = createClosedSolutionFitting(typeSupport);
027
028        Plot mrePlot = new Plot("RME");
029        mrePlot.display();
030
031        Plot fitPlot = new Plot("Fit vs Regularization");
032        fitPlot.setYRange(-2, 2);
033        ((L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer<N>) regression.getOptimizer()).setLambda(typeSupport.zero());
034        fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(regression.fitComplexity(m), "Overfitted");
035        fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport).getEstimationFunction(), "Target");
036        fitPlot.display();
037
038        N lambda = typeSupport.one();
039        N e = typeSupport.valueOf(10);
040        for (int i = 0; i < begin; i++) {
041            lambda = typeSupport.divide(lambda, e);
042        }
043        for (int i = begin; i <= end; i++) {
044            Threads.sleepSilently(sleep);
045
046            String name = "log10(" + Notations.LAMBDA + ") = -" + i;
047            System.out.println(name + " (N = " + lambda + ")");
048            ((L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer<N>) regression.getOptimizer()).setLambda(lambda);
049            LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model = regression.fitComplexity(m);
050            lambda = typeSupport.divide(lambda, e);
051
052            fitPlot.plotTargetOutput(model, "Regularized Fit");
053            Pair<Float, Map<String, Float>> currentRmes = regression.calculateRMEs(model);
054            mrePlot.addToSeries("Train RME", new float[]{-i}, new float[]{currentRmes.left()});
055            for (Map.Entry<String, Float> currentRmeEntry : currentRmes.right().entrySet()) {
056                mrePlot.addToSeries(currentRmeEntry.getKey() + " RME", new float[]{-i}, new float[]{currentRmeEntry.getValue()});
057            }
058            fitPlot.getChart().setTitle(name);
059            fitPlot.redraw();
060            mrePlot.redraw();
061        }
062    }
063
064    private static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> createClosedSolutionFitting(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
065        SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator = SyntheticDataSets.sinus(typeSupport);
066        BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator = new PolynomialFunction.Generator<>(typeSupport);
067        return create(dataSetGenerator, basisFunctionGenerator);
068    }
069
070    public static <N extends Number> LinearRegression<N> create(SyntheticDataSets.SyntheticDataSet<N> dataSetGenerator, BasisFunction.Generator<N> basisFunctionGenerator) {
071        dataSetGenerator.setRandomSeed(165);
072        dataSetGenerator.setNoiseScale(0.5f);
073        DataSet<N> trainSet = dataSetGenerator.load(10);
074        DataSet<N> testSet = dataSetGenerator.load(1000);
075        Map<String, DataSet<N>> testSets = new LinkedHashMap<>();
076        testSets.put("Test Set", testSet);
077        return new LinearRegression<>(basisFunctionGenerator, trainSet, testSets, new L2RegularizedClosedSolutionOptimizer<>(basisFunctionGenerator.getCurrentNumberType()));
078    }
079
080}
